name: Brave Tales DEMO
description:
Brave tales is an RPG Game demo that will be finished on months to go. 

Brave tales tells a Story of two young friends who fights agains world's monsters, they live on a simple village where there is a sleeping dragon on a lake, when the dragon got killed, everyone make a festival,but some stranger things comes to happen..

The story will be further on final release. For now you will have the world and an great Dungeon to fight with Hard enemies to kill.

This Demo is has support for PC VR but isnt good enought yet. I am launch it now to receive feedback of players about everything even the PC specs are great, it will help on adjustments and new ideas are welcome.

There are plans to make it for PC,Mobile and on final release for VR 

Maded 90% with SmileGamebuilder and extra contents from friends,also hours of fun making it.

Requirement: Net Framework
